Detailed Description

template<typename... function_parameters>
class sigma::core::CallbackManager< function_parameters >

Object used to manager a specific callback.

This object is instantiated at locations where a callback is required. It handles a list of functions that will be called when the owner of this is triggered.

The CallbackManager supports arbitrary function types by using a template. Where the arguments of the callback function should be define through the template.

For example to instantiate a CallbackManager for a function that takes a boolean and two integers as its arguments:

sigma::core::CallbackManager<bool, int, int> my_callback_manager;

Member Function Documentation

template<typename... function_parameters>
chaos::uint64 sigma::core::CallbackManager< function_parameters >::register_function ( void(*)(function_parameters...)  callback_function)
inline

Registers the given function in this CallbackManager.

When this CallbackManager is triggered the registered function will be called.

Parameters
callback_functionThe function to register in this CallbackManager. The function's parameters must match the types provided to this object's template.
Returns
A globally unique value identifying the provided callback function. This id is unique across all CallbackManager instances.
template<typename... function_parameters>
void sigma::core::CallbackManager< function_parameters >::unregister_function ( chaos::uint64  id)
inline

Unregisters the function associated with the given id from this CallbackManager.

Once a function has been unregistered it will no longer be called when this object is triggered.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::KeyErrorIf there is no function associated with the given id in this CallbackManager.
Parameters
idThe identifier associated with the function to unregister.

Member Data Documentation

template<typename... function_parameters>
void(*)(function_parameters...) sigma::core::CallbackManager< function_parameters >::get_function(chaos::uint64 id) const
inline

Returns the function associated with the given id.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::KeyErrorIf there is no function associated with the given id in this CallbackManager.
